title: The Adaptive Security Engine ? A Quantum Leap Forward for Application and API Protection
description: At Akamai, our mission is to make application and API security highly effective and easy. As part of that effort, we are excited to announce the Adaptive Security Engine -- a new core technology powering Akamai's application and API protection offerings, designed to enable a hands-off approach to protecting web applications and APIs with the highest degree of confidence.
author: Amol Mathur
